mention.text: the state of insecurity that prevails in the country to continue
the expression of a nation that could disappear or lose its freedoms and democracy
a proposal presented by idealistic youths
the only way we can offer solutions to future generations , because the colombian people are now looking to their future with uncertainty and fear
